last_episode_to_air.name: Sangeet Samrat
last_episode_to_air.overview: Joy, sorrow, and adrenaline charge through the final episode as Radhe and Digvijay sing-off against each other in a fierce battle for Rathod family's musical future.

name: Bandish Bandits
overview: Indian classical singer Radhe and pop star Tamanna. Despite their contrasting personalities, the two set-out together on a journey of self-discovery to see if opposites, though they might attract, can also adapt and go the long haul.

episodes.name: Blue Bandit
episodes.overview: Radhe, a music prodigy in the classical tradition, meets Tamanna, a viral Youtube Pop sensation. who comes from a world, diametrically opposite to him.

episodes.name: Shuddhikaran
episodes.overview: Radhe's interaction with Tamanna jeopardizes his musical dream so that he has to prove himself to his mentor and grandfather, Panditji

episodes.name: Roleplay
episodes.overview: Radhe begins to sing with Tamanna for financial reasons, but love and attraction grow between the young couple as they work on the first song together.

episodes.name: Phas Gaye
episodes.overview: Personal and musical stress starts to show as Radhe feverishly juggles the simultaneous and clashing demands of Tamanna and Panditji.

episodes.name: Masked Man
episodes.overview: Radhe gets a shocking glimpse into the inner life of his grandfather, even as he struggles to navigate a tense music video shoot with Tamanna.

episodes.name: A Star Is Born
episodes.overview: Radhe starts training under Panditji to sing against his estranged uncle Digvijay, while his first song with Tamanna releases and is an instant hit

episodes.name: #CoupleGoals
episodes.overview: Radhe takes on new gigs to help repay his father's loan, which puts a strain on his increasingly fraught relationships with both Tamanna and Panditji

episodes.name: Bandish Bandits
episodes.overview: Radhe teaches Tamanna to sing live for a last shot at her dream of collaborating with an international pop star, while his own training with Panditji receives an enormous setback.

episodes.name: A Separation
episodes.overview: Radhe is utterly broken and on the verge of giving up as he loses both Tamanna and Panditji, but his soft-spoken mother rises to save the day.

episodes.name: Sangeet Samrat
episodes.overview: Joy, sorrow, and adrenaline charge through the final episode as Radhe and Digvijay sing-off against each other in a fierce battle for Rathod family's musical future.
